description:
Galko`s skin got really dark as a result of tanning.
Otako comments that since Galko`s skin has tanned so much, her nipples must be dark as well. Along with Ojou, Otako yells that Galko has dark nipples.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Is It True That You`re an Otaku Girl?
オタクな女の子って本当ですか?
